Name: DiffDiskSettings
SummaryComment: Specifies the ephemeral Disk Settings for the operating system disk used by the compute node (VM).

Key.Name: Placement
Key.SummaryComment: This property can be used by user in the request to choose the location e.g., cache disk space for Ephemeral OS disk provisioning. For more information on Ephemeral OS disk size requirements, please refer to Ephemeral OS disk size requirements for Windows VMs at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/windows/ephemeral-os-disks#size-requirements and Linux VMs at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/linux/ephemeral-os-disks#size-requirements.
